msbt.message: <10_10 />Gah! Where'd you come from?! <10_9 /><20_2 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="6" />I thought you, I don't know, were a vampire? Or paparazzi?Hang on, aren't thoseâ€”<10_4 /> No. That joke's too obvious.I'm thinking about some heavy stuff. Could you please come back later?
<10_10 />Ahhh! !<10_9 /> You scared me so bad, I forgot what I was thinking about!Now I have to start over. Let's hang out later, though, 'K?
<20_2 arg="6" /><10_10 />GAH!<20_3 arg="6" /> !<10_9 />I'm kind of trying to figure out a thing right now Could you please give me, like, some alone time?
